channel.title: General Shop?

item.title: General Shop?
item.dc:creator: @chinny9 chinny9
item.description:
@chinny9 wrote:


For some reason,
I added the NPC to Autospawn.cfg, Client.cfg, and NPCHandler.cfg

The thing which I don’t get, is that I can’t sell ANY item into the General Shop? :S
Also, not sure if this has anything to do with it, but it’s ‘talk to’ and not ‘trade’.

Also, I was using a guide in the Tutorial section, but for some reasons as soon as I loaded them, they all started saying An Error Has Occured, aka, I do not have permission to read the topic, or something.
Guide I was using: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html

Client.cfg

} else if (NPCID == 520) { // General Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1;

NPCHandler.cfg

if (npcs[i].npcType == 520) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "General Store!"; } }

Autospawn.cfg

spawn = 520 3366 2976 0 0 0 0 0 1 //General Shop

Read full topic
